episodes.synopsis: Head to the mystical island of Sumatra, where it's rumored that a creature who's half man, half ape is living in the island's impenetrable jungles.
episodes.title: Man Ape of Sumatra

episodes.synopsis: Travel to the depths of the Amazon forest to find out whether the tales of a terrifying mystery beast known as the Mapinguari are true or false.
episodes.title: Nightmare of the Amazon

episodes.synopsis: Travel deep into the inhospitable Cameroon jungle to investigate a dinosaur-like creature the Pygmy tribes call Mokele-mbembe.
episodes.title: Swamp Monster of the Congo

episodes.synopsis: This episode aims to unearth the zoological truth behind a sea serpent known as Caddy, reported to be swimming off the coast of British Columbia.
episodes.title: Sea Serpent of the North

episodes.synopsis: This episode takes viewers to the Gobi Desert to investigate the freakish Mongolian death worm, said to spray acid, give electric shocks and explode.
episodes.title: Mongolian Death Worm

video.title: Beast Hunter
video.synopsis: Biologist Pat Spain travels the world to investigate reports of cryptid sightings, including a dinosaur-like creature in the Congo.
